article_title: Obama Executive Action Gun Control Plans
article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Lilli Petersen
article_metadata.description: In his weekly address, President Obama announced a plan to examine executive action options on gun control.

og.description: Update: 12:15 p.m.: The White House announced that President Obama will participate in a live, televised town hall this Thursday, January 7, to discuss gun violence in the United States. The event will be held at George Mason University, outside of Washington, D.C. It will air on CNN starting at
og.title: Obama Announces Plan To Take On The "Unfinished Business" Of Gun Control
